mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_CATE, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.MEMBER_NUMBER, N.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE N JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY N.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_CATE, N.NOTICE_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NUMBER, N.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE, N.NOTICE_CONTENT FROM TBL_NOTICE N JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY N.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE DESC
